{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sonos |model=S13 |fcc_date=08/28/2017 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless speaker system, IoT |fcc_id=SBVRM012 |ic_id=5373A-RM012 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H256M4HV-5E IT:E |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=DFS, Alexa, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=78:28:CA }} {{TagLine|802.11 a/b/g/n (HT20) Client Device RM012}}
Functionality description from the [https://fccid.io/SBVRM012/Test-Report/Report-DTS-1-of-4-3529225.pdf DTS Report 1]: :"The EUT is 802.11 a/b/g/n (HT20) Client Device. Product model S13 is a high-performance all-in-one wireless smart speaker and part of Sonosâ€™ home sound system. S13 adds integrated voice control functionality with far field microphones. Moreover, the device will support multiple voice platforms and music services, allowing customers to effortlessly control their music on Sonos." <!-- {{FCC ST|02/24/2018|indexme.}}-->
